channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- library-go

item.title: CVE-2019-14854|2024-08-05T00:26:39.141Z -- red%20hat -- library-go
item.description: OpenShift Container Platform 4 does not sanitize secret data written to static pod logs when the log level in a given operator is set to Debug or higher. A low privileged user could read pod logs to discover secret material if the log level has already been modified in an operator by a privileged user.
